job description:
Hi,

Please go through the below our direct client requirement and let me know your interest, If you are interested, Please respond back with your updated resume ASAP.

Job Title: Data Scientist - (Very Urgent)

Location: Research Triangle Park(RTP), NC

Duration: Longterm

Job Description:

• Good experience in Big data technologies HBase, hive, spark, Cassandra, Logstash, RDBMS (SQL Server)

• Should have good experience SQL and manipulate data

• Should have comfortable in handling large volumes of data.

• Should have experience in data ingestion, data wrangler and munging

• Should have experience in data visualization and exploration

• Should have experience in machine learning

• Should be hands on in R, Python, Scala, Java.

• Should seek inferences and patterns in data and form hypothesis, disprove and prove the hypothesis (most important ability)

• Candidate should have about 5 to 7 years’ experience, should be working with minimum experience each of areas at least 1.5 years to 2 years.

• Person with security, logging, process mining and event mining is preferred.



Thanks & Regards,
Sreedhar
Cystems Logic Inc,
Ph: 732-230-2806


Fax: 408-834-7260
Email: sree@cystemslogic.com
